functions.name: createcustomer
functions.description: Creates a new customer with the specified details, including personal information and addresses. You can also specify whether to send a welcome email to the new customer. createCustomer

functions.name: updateorder
functions.description: Updates an existing order's details using its unique identifier (orderId). To update an order, you must first retrieve the orderId using the conversation history or the '/orders.json' endpoint with the appropriate filters to find the specific order. updateOrder

functions.name: sendcustomerinvite
functions.description: Sends an invitation email to a customer to activate their account. The customerId is required and can be obtained by either finding the customer id in the conversation history or creating a customer using the '/customers.json' endpoint or by searching for an existing customer. sendCustomerInvite

functions.name: updatecustomer
functions.description: Updates an existing customer's details using their unique identifier (customerId). To update a customer, you must first retrieve the customerId using the conversation history or the '/customers/search.json' endpoint with the appropriate search query. updateCustomer

functions.name: updateproduct
functions.description: Updates an existing product's details using its unique identifier (product_id). To update a product, you must first retrieve the product_id either from the conversation history or by using the '/products.json' endpoint. updateProduct
